title: T20 WC: Zimbabwe kickstart campaign with dominant win over Oman

In reply, Brian Bennett’s unbeaten 48 and Brendan Taylor’s 31 guided Zimbabwe to a comfortable chase in just over 13 overs. The win highlighted Zimbabwe’s strong bowling attack and Bennett’s excellent form.

title: As cos lose trillions in market cap, China & South Korea warn against an AI agent
description: Global software companies have seen over a trillion in market value losses, triggered by Anthropic's AI tool. Concerns over open-source AI agents like OpenClaw are growing, leading South Korea and China to restrict its use due to security and data privacy risks. OpenClaw, designed to perform real-world actions for LLMs, is raising alarms about potential data leaks and cyberattacks.

Watergate revelations: Nixon asked China to interfere in India-Pak 1971 War
description: In his grand jury testimony, Nixon described a secret assurance given to Beijing during the war. His full statement reads: “The Russians were supporting India. … Nobody was supporting Pakistan because there was an embargo on the shipment of arms. … But we were giving moral support to them, and also we gave to the Chinese an assurance privately that if India jumped Pakistan and China decided to take on the Indians that we would support them.”

title: Rs 3cr Lamborghini, Rs 37-lakh tax dodge: Anonymous email exposes 'supercar scam'

Investigators uncovered forged invoices and fabricated ownership records, suggesting an attempt to undervalue the luxury vehicle and avoid tax dues. The owner of H1 Car Care and the original buyer are now named as accused.

title: Beyond patriarchy: How the 'duty' men created became their greatest source of isolation
description: A significant number of Indian men grapple with profound loneliness, often masked by societal expectations of stoicism and duty. This widespread issue, extending beyond romantic relationships, stems from cultural norms that discourage emotional expression.  Addressing this requires integrated mental health support and community initiatives, moving beyond blame to foster understanding and well-being for all.

title: Google employees send letter to top execs demanding to cut ties with DHS
description: Nearly 1,000 Google employees are demanding the company sever ties with the Department of Homeland Security, citing contracts with ICE and CBP. They allege Google's technology fuels "state violence and repression." Employees seek transparency on contracts, a Q&A session, and protection for all workers, calling for an end to complicity in government actions.

title: In focus podcast | What is driving the latest surge of violence in Balochistan?
